refnamediv.refpurpose: Provides operation of Filtering on Input Images

listitem.para: It is Input Image which is to be Filtered
the output image depth (-1 to use src.depth()).
It accepts Integer/Float as Input 1->MORPH_RECT 2-> MORPH_ELLIPSE 3-> MORPH_CROSS
It accepts a list as input specifying the size of Kernel needed example (5,5)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: As in one-dimensional signals, images also can be filtered with various low-pass filters(LPF), high-pass filters(HPF) etc. LPF helps in removing noises, blurring the images etc. HPF filters helps in finding edges in the images.
